subject: Review Request for SIMSONN hardware
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN Team,

My name is Adrián, and I am the Lead Editor of Outlaws Racing, a website 
dedicated to news, guides, reviews, and much more related to virtual 
racing and motorsports, reaching over 100,000 monthly impressions.

Since our creation a few years ago, we have become a trusted source of 
information for our readers, collaborating with multiple brands and 
publishing product reviews that are highly appreciated by our audience.

We have been closely following SIMSONN’s hardware, and we would be very 
interested in conducting an in-depth review of one of your pedal sets, 
such as the “Simsonn Plus X”. With the holiday season approaching, we 
believe this could be a great opportunity for both sides, potentially 
providing a boost in sales for your product.

The review would be published on our website, promoted across all our 
social media channels, and complemented by a video on our YouTube 
channel as well as short-form content on platforms such as TikTok and 
YouTube Shorts.

We look forward to your response. Thank you very much for your time and 
consideration.

Kind regards,
Adrián

-- 
Adrian C. | Lead Editor

outlawsracing.es

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrián Collado,      Thank you very much for reaching out and for your interest in reviewing the Simsonn Plus X pedals. We truly appreciate the work you do at Outlaws Racing and the value your content brings to the sim racing community.  Before we move forward, could you please share the links to your website and social media channels (including YouTube)? Our team needs to review them internally so we can evaluate the collaboration opportunity.  Once we receive the links, we’ll forward them to our manager for approval and get back to you as soon as possible.  Thank you again for contacting us — we look forward to your reply.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi!

Of course, these are the links:

*Website:* https://outlawsracing.es/

     Also, you can another review*for similar hardware*: 
https://outlawsracing.es/en/review-simjack-mini-pedals/

*Facebook*: https://www.facebook.com/people/Outlaws-Racing/100094469546383/

*X (Twitter)*: https://x.com/outlaws_racing

*Instagram:* https://www.instagram.com/otws_racing

*YouTube*: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW8TH6W77JW6Qx4zD5ayQ0g

*TikTok:* https://www.tiktok.com/@outlawsracing

The social media platforms where we are most active are Twitter and 
Instagram, but as I said, we can post several videos on YouTube and 
TikTok. Also, the review would be written in both Spanish and English, 
allowing us to reach a wider audience.
